channel.title: [PI]Exception Development team[317]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,
My name is Will, and I am currently the owner of Exception. We are a fast growing server, vps hosted with webclient. We could use some help from talented Coders, Website Developer, and Mysql experts. I will include a list of what we currently have in our server, and what we are adding.
- Base is Pi if your wondering. - Skillcape Emotes - Skilling area! - Turmoil - Soulsplit pray 100% working like rs. - Kill/death ratio - Dragon Claws only GFX missing. - Armadyl boss working perfectly (only needs kc interface) - Bandos Boss working perfectly (only needs kc interface) - Saradomin Boss working perfectly (only needs kc interface) - Zamorak boss working perfectly (only needs kc interface) - Need 20 KC to enter godwars - Dragon Fireshield Special when operated - 474+ Emotes loaded from cache - 474+ Gfx’s loaded from cache - 474+ interfaces loaded from cache - Almost all specials work - Rune Crossbow (e)’s special effects working like RS - Ice barrage multi freeze - Perfect Barrows(Secret Coffin, Shovel, chest) - Pest Control with correct interfaces and wait timers. - Perfect Combat + master switching system - Amazing Stability - Duel Arena + staking. - King Black Dragon with 474 anims and gfx - All Skills Working! - Amazing fight pits. - Auto Retaliate works - Dark Bow special working perfectly - Awesome Starter - Home is Edgevile. Including Altars/Shops/Slayer/Thieve & More - Ava’s Accumulator working - Slayer tower with 3 floors, and slayer tasks! - Clan Chat with toggeling + deleting clan - PVP drops no pvp system shit. - 100% Working clue scrolls - Toggling for Status orbs on/off - Toggling for new/old Hp bar - Toggling for new/old hitmarks - Toggling for transparent/normal right click menu - Toggling for X10 Hits - Gameframe settings 474, 525, 562. - Private chat color changing - Pk points shop - PVP armour correct ints + model like runescape - ALL NEW DUNGENEERING! - Real runescape Clues
Spots that need to be filled:
Web master: 1/2 - Xxx9234, (open)
Coders: 2/3 - Xxx9234, Will, (open)
Mysql: 0/1 - (open)
Application:
[code]Name: Email: Applying for: Years experience: Past projects:[/code]
Pictures: [img]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/barrows-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/clanchat.jpg[/img] [img]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/dung.jpg[/img] [img]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/emotes-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/godwars-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/output.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1j2j5t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/xqfby0.jpg[/img]
Thanks,
Will

if (anInt189 == anInt192) { method293(); anint192--; }

item.description:

[quote=“mr wizzard, post:21, topic:373533”][quote author=SunSpec221 link=topic=469543.msg3446092#msg3446092 date=1293445532]

Name: patrick
Email: monkeypa@hotmail.com
Applying for: webmaster/coder
Years experience: 6 years *messing with java 2 years actually coding it and php (somewhat like java) and 2 years with mysql
Past projects:i was building a social network then i had to take down because of lack of money to support also i built a good p server and took down because i didnt have time or money to host all by my self

*by messing i mean reading it and making small edits not really editing the hardcode

I doubt you were going to make a social networking network.

This needs a new VPS
[/quote]

i was i would get vouches for people who saw in beta but i dont need to prove to you[/quote]

Do you still have the beta. And yes i agree you don’t need to show me but i will know if your lieing or not.
